entry.title: Thursday: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain or ice pellets mixed with snow beginning early this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Freezing rain or rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with snow changing to rain near midnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 60%
